message: Can't thank you enough.
name: Simon F
title: Looks great!

message: Glen has been here 2 days so far and has made such a difference, strumming and cutting all the ivy and brambles back
name: Sandra Curtis
title: Amazing

message: Very hard working and tidy, my garden has been transformed.  Highly recommended.
name: Rachel
title: Fantastic Service

message: So glad to have found this company! Not just local to us, but also flexible and with great work ethic. I've needed work done at multiple locations and it has never been an issue. They always complete the task the exact way I ask and with great detail and timing. So helpful!
name: LECLERE
title: So helpful!

message: Great job done and a very fair price will definitely use again
name: David Flinton
title: Roof de moss and gutter cleaned

message: Our garden is really looking good and no doubt will get better and better.
name: Karen
title: Garden

message: Vue Du Vallon Handyman came at short notice, great communication, worked very hard to get as much done as possible in the time.
name: Emma
title: Hart

message: Glen did a fantastic job highly recommended üëèüëçüëåüòÄ
name: Simon
title: Garden maintenance

message: Turned up on time. Worked hard. Did what he promised  We are happy with the result üòä
name: CB
title: Strimming and Other Garden work

message: Glenn has been incredibly helpful, and achieved things others have not (or even attempted). Nice guy, does what he says he will.
name: Gill
title: My French house

message: Great handyman, doesn't give up until everything is perfect. We are super satisfied!
name: Theo Conijn
title: Gutter cleaning

message: Initial visit proved very successful.  Prompt appointment, friendly and knowledgeable attitude.  Good, steady worker and polite.  We were very happy with the work done on his first visit, also good value for money.  Fortnightly follow up visits set up to continue our garden programme.  No hesitation in placing this recommendation.
name: Janette Jenkins
title: Gardening

message: Whatever the task Glenn works efficiently and swiftly. His work is of a very high standard. We would definitely use him again.
name: Jack
title: Extremely hard working and conscientious

message: Great works carried out in garden, completely reliable and looking forward to further gardening works for our garden
name: Natasha
title: Great gardener

message: It has been very difficult finding a competent and reliable painter, but Glenn was recommended to us and although we were a little doubtful our fears were unfounded.  He was very pleasant and did exactly what he said he would.  He was also a very tidy worker.  We have absolutely no hesitation in recommending him, in fact we have asked him to return.
name: Brian
title: Room Repaint

message: Faultless work of the highest standard. Glenn was punctual, hard working and accurate. I highly recommend Glenn.
name: Mick Hague
title: Installation

message: Turned up promptly, did a great job, very pleased
name: Jo
title: Strimming

message: Gutters neatly cleaned and that's how we got in touch with Glenn, He also cleaned and re-coated the facades of our house. He keeps his appointments and we are very satisfied with his work for us.
name: Theo
title: Cleaning and Painting

message: Hardworking, efficient and reliable
name: Andrews
title: Garden maintenance

message: I posted on Facebook to find a handyman in the Bellac area, Vue du Vallon was straight on it and went to view the property offering a good quote, it's very difficult trusting someone when you are in the Uk and they are working on your house but everything has been very good so far and he has had continuous work on those grounds.  I would highly recommend him.
name: Lee Marshall
title: Repointing

message: Professional, on time, great work and appreciate the before and after pictures when I'm not there. Very easy to deal with.
name: Estelle
title: Thanks! Fab work

message: I met Mr. Packer via email as I purchased a house in France while still being in the United States. He was cordial helpful and considerate, and willing to help me tackle my garden. He was absolutely gracious and helping me figure out the waste management system of my village where my house is located. His work was outstanding and my garden looks completely cleaned out and ready for a whole new fresh look. I am continuing my work with Mr. Packer  to paint the entire interior of my house and he equally helped me with the shipment of my paint so I could do my rehab for miles away. I recommend him highly.!
name: Danielle Dronet
title: Fabulous Garden Clean Out

message: Needed the gutters cleaning on the bungalow and some power washing done. Glenn arrived on time, did what was asked and it was a freezing day. Recommended.
name: Ron Layzell
title: Great Service

message: All the tasks in the garden were carried out with care and skill and we were very impressed that all clippings and pruning were meticulously collected up and taken to the compost heap. We were very happy overall and are looking forward to the next visit!
name: Douglas
title: An excellent experience

message: Excellent work, thank you!
name: AG
title: Wall pointing

message: Dark planks and beams transformed, With a smile!
name: Colleen
title: Great job!

message: good work done, painting in the house and preparing for external works.
name: Gill
title: painting

message: Great job by Glenn, large area that had very little pointing done over 8 days.
name: Mark
title: Repointing work

message: We have had monthly visits for the past 10 months or so and have been very happy with all the work done. Pruning, weeding, splitting and stacking logs and patio pressure-washing have all been undertaken with cheerfulness, effectiveness and efficiency. The price paid for all this work is very reasonable so we can thoroughly recommend Vue du Vallon Handyman.
name: Douglas Snowden
title: Excellent and efficient gardening work

message: We had a problem with a door that wasn't locking properly. After some consideration, Glenn came up with a simple solution. Well thought out Glenn.
name: Kim
title: Solution found
